name: The Quest (itch) (Cobra-117)
description:
What is this game?

You are on the quest for wisdom, young apprentice. You inner demons and the dark forces will attempt to stop you, Your quest will be full of challenges. Good luck...

The ennemies will attack you in the form of balls. You have to protect yourself with your magice aura, by pressing 'X' on your keyboard. However, your karma deplete while the aura is active (and refuel when it's not). You'll need to find the right timing...

Credits

Sounds from [Zapspslat](https://www.zapsplat.com)
Musics from [Pixabay](https://pixabay.com/)

Every feedbacks are welcome
